column1: 表 13-10 產業及社福外籍勞工行蹤不明概況
column6: Table 13-10 Missing Status of Foreign Workers in Productive Industries and Social Welfare

column1: 資料來源： 內政部移民署。
說       明： 1.月外勞行蹤不明比率＝月外勞行蹤不明人數÷本月與上月外勞人數平均數*100%
column6: Note：  1.Monthly foreign workers missing rate＝ number of missing foreign workers in the month  ÷ mid-month foreign workers × 100%.

column1: 2.年外勞行蹤不明比率＝年外勞行蹤不明人數÷本年各月底外勞人數平均數*100%
column6: 2.Yearly foreign workers missing rate ＝ number of missing foreign workers in the year ÷ annual foreign workers × 100%.

column1: 3.自99年1月起剔除重複報案件數和外僑人數。
column6: 3.The repeated reports and the aliens are removed from the data series from Jan. 2010.

column1: 4.「其他」包含馬來西亞、蒙古等其他國籍。
column6: 4.”Others” includes Malaysia, Mongolia, and other countries.
